column7: Examination of global food production, consumption, and trade; problems of hunger and population; the role of agricultural development, trade, and aid in relieving hunger. Prerequisite: ACE 100 or ECON 102 or consent of instructor.
column9: Prerequisite: ACE 100 or ECON 102 or consent of instructor.
column10: Grand Challenge-Sustainability, Cultural Studies - Non-West, and Social & Beh Sci - Soc Sci course.
